Title: Your Personal Defense Permit
Text:
Official Notification: Personal Defense Permit Approval.

Head to Gramados Town Hall to finish the paperwork.
CompleteText: The Personal Defense Permit is issued to responsible citizens who have demonstrated the need and capacity to carry small firearms for self-defense. With rising concerns for personal safety in both urban and rural areas, this permit grants individuals the right to protect themselves while also emphasizing the importance of responsible firearm handling and compliance with Gramados laws.
